title: Arroz con Gandules Instant Pot Recipe
directions: Hit Sauté button and add olive oil, sofrito, olives, tomato sauce, sazon, and chicken bouillon
Stir constantly until fragrant and tender, but not browned; cook for about 3 minutes until everything is blended well.
Add the oregano, cilantro, and bay leaves.
Add the gandules and sauté for another minute or two.
Add the chicken broth and rice and stir
ingredients: 1 Packet of sazon – We used Goya
